author: Douglas Ko
comment: Sorting for Saved Homes is messed up. On desktop you can sort by status, For Sale, Pending, Sold. However on the App it sorts by updated date. So if a home just went pending or sold it shows on top of my list. I need scrool and find the actual for sale properties mixed in with the pending and sold ones. Terrible on Open house weekends when I'm trying to find the next house to visit. Terrible, terrible.

author: Freya Soren
comment: Wrote a Zillow review and Zillow wants me to edit it. No swearing or vulgarity anywhere in the review. Nancy Bivins is unprofessional is about all it says. But I guess Zillow won't allow reviews that aren't 100% positive.

reply.author: Zillow
reply.content: Our team would like to investigate right away. If you email appstorehelp@zillow.com we’ll reach out directly.

author: Paul Broccolo
comment: I don't like that you cant filter out 55+ communities. Seems fishy that the sellers/agents wont even post that in the notes. You have to expand everything and check the schools section to see the word  "Adult"  to know its 55+ community.

author: Lisa Hutson
comment: I used Zillow a couple of years ago to sell a home and had several negative issues.  I have tried about 10 times over the last two days to post a house for sale and I repeatedly get the message...can't process at this time...contact customer service.  I actually called them, got a voice mail saying that they may get back to me within 5 days. Zillow is a joke! I do not understand how it is supposedly the number one Realty website. My experience has been terrible and the app doesn't even give appropriate options for listing!

reply.author: Zillow
reply.content: Let’s get this sorted out. IF you email appstorehelp@zillow.com, a team member will be in touch shortly.

author: Robert Quigney
comment: Easy searches and user friendly. Seems like latest update has removed the "lot lines" feature. This is important to me. It is one of the reasons I use Zillow more often than competitors' apps.

Please make it possible to filter pet types allowed when searching rentals! This would be so helpful, being that when I search "pets allowed" a whole bunch of listings that specify only cats and small dogs are allowed show up, and I have a large dog.

I have used Zillow for last 3 years, very informative on Comps, Recent Sales, Recent Listings, and receive my views, ratings per day. I have contacted Zillow several times to discuss my Zestimates, provided the facts I have and the Zestimate was corrected. Thank You Team JBoyd Hou, Tx

author: Hui Hong Lim
comment: Like the information. But recently having a lot of issues with the app. Screen goes blank and then nothing shows up right. Hope they fix this soon

author: Jill Scan
comment: i love that the owner can upload new pics for chg of seasons outside etc and what i love section. Ease of use is great, as is customer service! There's only 1 area i feel that Zillow could improve on in my opinion- As a Owner- Agent the Virtual Tour Button is really hidden not even bolded under the MLS#. Ive noticed the Premier App (which I cant get into) & the regular cell video app will get your listing a Banner saying Video right on the Listing's Main Picture which is fine, if your willing to put up a video that you cant add in any music, pan, zoom or reduce glare or crispen up the Clarity of the video or add any Title to it. However, if you have a professional video or one youve made on your PC one cant get a Banner on the listings main photo and its such small print not underlined tucked 1/4 of the way down below the MLS# its very hard to readily notice! Where the uploaded Cell Video is instead given Bold Banner on the Main Picture with readily seen access! In my mind, BOTH the pro video or any video uploaded to YouTube should be given the same banner as the vids uploaded direct to Zillow thru their app via a cell phone. Plse. consider giving both forms of video's from cell or YouTube, the same equal highlite of the same banner on the listing's main picture! It shouldnt matter to Zillow which form you employed to get the Video there! and if one is trying to produce a better video lets face it a cell vid without PC editing cant get rid of direct sunlite glare from a window or shadows. So plse. dont penalize a YouTube Vid., bbut instead give those equal billing of the same banner to even the playing field between competition, so the pro video has the same importance of the same billung as the cell video using your apps. Zillow is the only R.E. website, that almost hides the Virtual Tour button for a YouTube video. If Zillow would do this, you'd be in aces!

author: A Murray
comment: Great way to search for homes and property. However, when Zillow emails me an article, clicking on the link brings me to the home search page in the app. I don't see a way to read articles in the app.

author: yef correa
comment: This app does everything i need looking for a house between the breakdown and information it provides. It has definitely made house hunting a little easier.

author: cartala mcgill-stout
comment: You show how long the listing has been available and you advise similar listings! No one else accommodates like you all!!

author: Ajsparx temp
comment: Just woke me up at 2AM with a notification. Why in the middle of the night, zillow?

author: Corki Sweet
comment: Shopping for home from another state is really difficult. Zillow make the process easier by providing great details about every home!

author: Daniel Franco
comment: Very responsive and easy to jump from one spot to another, without having to back track every step.

author: Jonathan Wilkins
comment: I like you app but the lack of information is frustrating sometimes

author: AJ Rikli
comment: Interface not quite as quick or user friendly as desired, but overall very good

author: Scott Phillips
comment: Inaccurate and poor customer service. It has my 600k house mixed up with a 111k house in another city. I can't claim my house because if this or make any updates. The street view is the back of the house from another street from 3+ years ago, not the current Google street view.

reply.author: Zillow
reply.content: We’d love a chance to turn your experience around – if you email appstorehelp@zillow.com, a team member will assist shortly.

comment: Amazing. I LOVE THIS APP SOOO MUCH. I use it everywhere I go, its easy, simple, fast, it has all the information I need and simply amazing.
Love looking at houses on here just wish there was more in small cities

author: Monica Conklin-Clark
comment: Love the information, very clear and by far a MUST for looking at properties.

author: Larry Vaughn
comment: Bunch of unwanted email junk from this site, no way to st

reply.author: Zillow
reply.content: Let’s get this sorted out. IF you email appstorehelp@zillow.com, a team member will be in touch shortly.

author: Skip Watkins
comment: I'm finding errors and incomplete information in the listings, especially in HOA fees and info...

author: M F
comment: Love the app, it's actually BETTER than the website interface. You can search by single apartment races such as just 1BR, you cannot do that in the website. Great app!

author: Michael Hall
comment: Use it to list my grandmothers rentals. I love it.

author: Amy Hernandez
comment: Actually lets you unsave favorited homes, unlike the desktop website.
Fast browsing in area, great details on homes sold,selling and going to sell. Plus prices of all homes. Would use this to take info to table with realtors!

author: Dani Price
comment: Man, I'm addicted.
Very convenient. Easy to view and use on a smart phone. Didn't notice any glitches. More practical than using it on a desktop. Updates without any hitches!

author: Michelle LaVoie
comment: Zillow always yields dependable results

author: Al Holder
comment: Let's me get away in my mind
Better than realtor or trulia.

author: jr mx
comment: It's a really helpfull app
I like getting the daily weekly info

author: Emane Halloway
comment: Has great info, but they use to have tax info not anymore

author: Assad Muhammad
comment: This app was Greta for finding a home!

author: Rebecca Goodsite
comment: easy to find houses!

author: Jill Garner
comment: Keeping up on the housing market is a hobby of mine. Zillow is my favorite way.
Very informative Application and trustworthy

author: Thomas Dunham
comment: It's great!
